steps.title: Dreamy
steps.content: Dreamy Calling eyes “dreamy” is a cute way for a crush to say they’re attractive.

steps.title: Striking
steps.content: Striking Striking eyes stand out from the crowd and immediately catch your attention.

steps.title: Stunning
steps.content: Stunning Someone will stop right in their tracks if they even look into the person’s eyes.

steps.title: Breathtaking
steps.content: Breathtaking The person’s eyes look so beautiful that one look takes someone’s breath away.

steps.title: Bright
steps.content: Bright “Bright” could reference the person’s eye color or a playful energy that radiates from them. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Sparkling
steps.content: Sparkling Mentioning the twinkle in someone’s eyes makes them sound fun and lively. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Dazzling
steps.content: Dazzling Dazzling eyes glisten in the light and are a real show-stopper.

steps.title: Lustrous
steps.content: Lustrous Lustrous eyes shine bright no matter where the person looks.

steps.title: Angelic
steps.content: Angelic When you say someone has angelic eyes, they’ll seem like they’re glowing and perfect.

steps.title: Tender
steps.content: Tender Someone who’s tender-eyed has a gentle look that makes you feel comfortable and relaxed around them.

steps.title: Compassionate
steps.content: Compassionate A person with compassionate eyes has a kind and caring look that people can trust.

steps.title: Genuine
steps.content: Genuine The person is true to their emotions and that they'll have no problem opening up to you.

steps.title: Soulful
steps.content: Soulful Soulful eyes capture so much emotion that you know exactly how the person is feeling just by meeting their gaze.

steps.title: Enticing
steps.content: Enticing People are drawn to how attractive enticing eyes are and feel like they can open themselves up.

steps.title: Magnetic
steps.content: Magnetic Magnetic eyes draw someone in so they feel more connected to the person.

steps.title: Captivating
steps.content: Captivating If a person has captivating eyes, then they seem really charming and make people feel comfortable around them.

steps.title: Bewitching
steps.content: Bewitching When the person looks at you, you feel like you’re put under a spell with how beautiful they are.

steps.title: Mesmerizing
steps.content: Mesmerizing When someone has mesmerizing eyes, they capture a person’s full attention and stay engaged. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Entrancing
steps.content: Entrancing Entrancing eyes make someone so charming that it’s hard to look away from them.

steps.title: Playful
steps.content: Playful Just one look from the person lets someone know how much fun they’d have together.

steps.title: Tantalizing
steps.content: Tantalizing The look in the person’s eyes feels like they’re teasing romantically and are trying to flirt.

steps.title: Alluring
steps.content: Alluring Someone with alluring eyes has a sense of mystery, but in a sexy way. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Irresistible
steps.content: Irresistible The person has such an attractive look that it’s tough to say no to them.

steps.title: Seductive
steps.content: Seductive Calling eyes “seductive” shows that they turn someone on with just a glance. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Sultry
steps.content: Sultry Describe eyes as “sultry” if they’re filled with passion and romance.

steps.title: “Your eyes shine bright like the sun.”
steps.content: “Your eyes shine bright like the sun.” It sounds really sweet when you compare a person's eyes to something else that's already bright and radiant.

steps.title: “Your eyes are bright jewels twinkling in the light.”
steps.content: “Your eyes are bright jewels twinkling in the light.” Try saying "emeralds" when you're describing green eyes or "sapphires" for someone with blue eyes.

steps.title: “Your eyes are deeper than the ocean, and I could just get lost in them.”
steps.content: “Your eyes are deeper than the ocean, and I could just get lost in them.” Flatter someone with blue eyes by comparing them to bright pools of water.

steps.title: “When I look in your eyes, I see the whole world reflected back at me.”
steps.content: “When I look in your eyes, I see the whole world reflected back at me.” The person will find it really sweet that they have bright and beautiful eyes.

steps.title: “I’ll never get tired of looking into your eyes.”
steps.content: “I’ll never get tired of looking into your eyes.” It'll be so romantic that your feelings for the person haven't changed no matter how much time has passed.

steps.title: “Even if you just look in my direction, I instantly get butterflies.”
steps.content: “Even if you just look in my direction, I instantly get butterflies.” Make it sound like the slightest glance from them will make you feel warm and fuzzy.

steps.title: “My heart skips a beat every time you look my way.”
steps.content: “My heart skips a beat every time you look my way.” The person will know that you’re thinking of them romantically.

steps.title: “When our eyes lock, I can see right into your soul.”
steps.content: “When our eyes lock, I can see right into your soul.” Hint at a deeper connection any time you look at each other.

steps.title: “I see such a fire in your eyes.”
steps.content: “I see such a fire in your eyes.” Let the person know they give off a burning passionate look to start turning up the heat.

steps.title: “I feel so much love when you look at me.”
steps.content: “I feel so much love when you look at me.” The person has such a caring look in their eye that you know exactly how they’re feeling.
